, "Let's start."
Anna and her parents hopped on the yacht. Dad started the engine and the yacht gradually moved away from the shore. The colorful sails unfurled in the wind.
Anna's Mom pointed out at the ocean, "Look Anna, those dolphins are so fast!"
The wind blew gently and Anna and her family sailed away. It was a beautiful sight, with the blue water, white sails and the colorful boat.
Anna smiled and said, "Can we go sailing again?" Her parents laughed and nodded.

, "Let's make a tent!"
"Yes, great idea!" Lucy replied.
The two friends started looking for things to make their tent. They found some sticks and a big green blanket.
Then Lucy said, "We need an anchor to keep it strong."
Sam told her, "I know just the thing. Here, I'll use this big rock to anchor our tent. Now our tent is super extra strong."
The two friends laughed with joy, and they made the tent together. 
The tent was so strong that nothing could tear it down. 
Lucy and Sam were very happy.
